CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = 'PHQ9', 'Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?' + BR() + BR() + '0 = Not at all, 1 = Several Days, 2 = More than half the days, 3 = Nearly every day' + BR() + BR() + 'A score of 10 or higher is regarded as Clinical.', IF(RecordType.Name = 'GAD7', 'Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?' + BR() + BR() + '0 = Not at all, 1 = Several Days, 2 = More than half the days, 3 = Nearly every day' + BR() + BR() + 'A score of 8 or higher is regarded as Clinical.', null))
CustomField.label: Questionnaire Instruction
